titles.title: Subnational Visa Waiver Program Act of 2014

A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for the eligibility of certain territories and regions for designation for participation in the visa waiver program and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: 4/8/2014--Introduced. Subnational Visa Waiver Program Act of 2014 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to make a territory or region eligible for designation as a visa waiver program country if it is accorded treatment under a particular U.S. law different from that accorded to the country of which it is a part.
